assertions.text: The user should be able to create a group

evidence.description: User enters 'Add members' screen showing contact selection interface
User selects 'Minmin' as group member, shown in overlay with 'MEMBERS: 1 OF 1,023'
User types 'Test group' in the group name field on 'New group' screen
Loading indicator appears in top-right corner as group is being created
Group successfully created - chat screen shows 'You created this group' with 'Group · 2 members' confirmation

assertions.explanation: The user successfully created a group named 'Test group'. The creation flow is visible starting at t=5s when the 'Add members' screen appears, progressing through member selection (t=7s-9s), group naming (t=11s-14s), and creation completion (t=16s-18s). The final confirmation is shown at t=18s with the group chat screen displaying 'You created this group' with '2 members'.

assertions.text: The user should be able to add a member to the group

evidence.description: User searches for 'Min' in the search field on 'Add members' screen
User selects 'Minmin' contact - overlay shows selection with 'MEMBERS: 1 OF 1,023' and Minmin's profile visible
Group chat header shows 'Test group' with subtitle 'Minmin, You', confirming member addition. Group info states 'Group · 2 members'

assertions.explanation: The user successfully added a member ('Minmin') to the newly created group. This is evidenced by the member selection at t=7s-9s where 'Minmin' is selected from the contacts list, and confirmed in the final group screen at t=18s showing '2 members' (the creator 'You' and 'Minmin'). The member is visible in the group subtitle 'Minmin, You' at t=18s.

assertions.text: The user should be able to send a message to the group

evidence.description: Group chat screen opens with message input bar visible at bottom, but no message is typed or sent
System notification visible stating 'You changed the group description. Tap to view.' - this is a system message, not a user message
Final frame shows no user messages in the chat thread, only system notifications and group creation info

assertions.explanation: The user did not send a message to the group. While the group was successfully created and the chat screen is visible from t=18s onwards, no text message composition or sending is observed. The message input area at the bottom of the screen remains unused throughout the recording. At t=41s-43s, only a system notification 'You changed the group description. Tap to view.' is visible, which is not a user-sent message to the group.

assertions.text: The user should be able to initiate a video call to the group

evidence.description: Video call button visible in top-right corner of group chat but not activated
Group info screen shows 'Video' button among action buttons, but no interaction observed
Final frame shows video call button still present but unused - no call was initiated

assertions.explanation: The user did not initiate a video call to the group. While the video call button is visible in multiple frames (t=18s, t=41s-43s in the top-right corner of the group chat), and also on the group info screen (t=23s, t=36s, t=38s), there is no evidence of the user tapping this button or a video call being initiated. No video call interface, connection screen, or related loading indicators appear throughout the recording.
